sec.p: The raw methylome data has been deposited into the NCBI Short Read Archive (SRA) under BioProject PRJNA208335 in the study SRP055861 and are accessible via the following URLs: brain: http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/?term=SRS964344 blood: http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/?term=SRS964345. The raw RRBS data are accessible via the following URLs: http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/?term=SRS1341021 and http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/?term=SRS1340777. The raw brain RNA-seq data is accessible via the URL: http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/?term=SRS866013. The version of the genome used in this paper can be found at GenBank under the accession GenBank:JRXK01000000. Datasets supporting the results of this article are also included in the additional files.
